mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopping_cart(non_member_id, product_id, member_check) VALUES(#{nonMemberId}, #{productId}, 0)
INSERT INTO shopping_cart(member_id, product_id, member_check) VALUES(#{memberId}, #{productId}, 1)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM shopping_cart WHERE non_member_id = #{nonMemberId} AND product_id = #{productId}
DELETE FROM shopping_cart WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND product_id = #{productId}
mapper.select: SELECT sc.non_member_id, sc.product_id, prod_img.product_image, p.product_name, p.selling_price FROM products p INNER JOIN shopping_cart sc ON sc.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN product_images prod_img ON prod_img.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sc.non_member_id = #{nonMemberId} GROUP BY product_id;

SELECT sc.member_id, sc.product_id, prod_img.product_image, p.product_name, p.selling_price FROM products p INNER JOIN shopping_cart sc ON sc.product_id = p.product_id INNER JOIN product_images prod_img ON prod_img.product_id = p.product_id WHERE sc.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT count(*) FROM shopping_cart WHERE non_member_id = #{nonMemberId}
SELECT count(*) FROM shopping_cart WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
